Package utils

Class WheatfieldActions

java.lang.Object
utils.WheatfieldActions
public class WheatfieldActions extends Object
This class handles the generation, ownership and growth of the three large wheatfields.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Leonard Fritz

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WheatfieldActions​(GameState sf)
    The Constructor attempts to read the Bitmap.bmp file into a BufferedImage variable, sets the variable amount and populates the WheatfieldOwnership HashMap with the appropiate key-value pairs.

    • wheatfieldOneTracker

      public HashMap<String,​ArableField> wheatfieldOneTracker
      Keeps track of all the arable field tiles within wheatfield #1

    • wheatfieldTwoTracker

      public HashMap<String,​ArableField> wheatfieldTwoTracker
      Keeps track of all the arable field tiles within wheatfield #2

    • wheatfieldThreeTracker

      public HashMap<String,​ArableField> wheatfieldThreeTracker
      Keeps track of all the arable field tiles within wheatfield #3

    • WheatfieldOwnership

      public HashMap<String,​Boolean> WheatfieldOwnership
      Keeps track of the player's ownership of the wheatfields

    • bitmap

      public BufferedImage bitmap

    • file

      private File file

    • amount

      int amount
      "amount" refers to the amount of wheat that the player per tile is given when harvesting. Its value is set in the Constructor according to the difficulty.

  • Constructor Details

    • WheatfieldActions

      public WheatfieldActions​(GameState sf)
      The Constructor attempts to read the Bitmap.bmp file into a BufferedImage variable, sets the variable amount and populates the WheatfieldOwnership HashMap with the appropiate key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      sf - sf is of type GameState and corresponds to the current state of the game

  • Method Details

    • BuyWheatfieldTwo

      public void BuyWheatfieldTwo​(GameState sf)
      This function completes to following steps to buy wheatfield #2 1. Checks whether player owns the wheatfield already and has enough money. 2. Loops through every tile of the map and checks if it is part of wheatfield #2. 3. Sets the variable owned to true. 4. After looping through the entire map the player is charged the price of wheatfield #2. 5. The HashMap WheatfieldOwnership is updated such that the player cannot buy wheatfield #2 again.
      Parameters:
      sf - The GameState is needed to charge the player the price of wheatfield #2.

    • BuyWheatfieldThree

      public void BuyWheatfieldThree​(GameState sf)
      This function completes to following steps to buy wheatfield #3 1. Checks whether player owns the wheatfield already and has enough money. 2. Loops through every tile of the map and checks if it is part of wheatfield #3. 3. Sets the variable owned to true. 4. After looping through the entire map the player is charged the price of wheatfield #3. 5. The HashMap WheatfieldOwnership is updated such that the player cannot buy wheatfield #3 again.
      Parameters:
      sf - The GameState is needed to charge the player the price of wheatfield #3.

    • GenerateWheatfieldOne

      public ArableField GenerateWheatfieldOne​(int x, int y)
      This function generates a new arable field tile, sets its coordinates and amount and puts it into the HashMap wheatfieldOneTracker.
      Parameters:
      x - x refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.
      y - y refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.

    • GenerateWheatfieldTwo

      public ArableField GenerateWheatfieldTwo​(int x, int y)
      This function generates a new arable field tile, sets its coordinates and amount and puts it into the HashMap wheatfieldTwoTracker.
      Parameters:
      x - x refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.
      y - y refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.

    • GenerateWheatfieldThree

      public ArableField GenerateWheatfieldThree​(int x, int y)
      This function generates a new arable field tile, sets its coordinates and amount and puts it into the HashMap wheatfieldThreeTracker.
      Parameters:
      x - x refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.
      y - y refers to position of the tile within the bitmap. It does not refer to the position of the tile on the actual, playable map.

    • updateWheatfields

      public void updateWheatfields()
      This function loops through every tile of the map and checks whether it is of type ArableField in which case it calls the update function. This function is executed regularily and indefinitely.

    • getarableFields

      public HashMap<String,​ArableField> getarableFields()
      A function that returns all wheatfieldTrackers into a unified hashmap of type
      Returns:
      HashMap containing all fields with their String position-ID as the key.
